name: vNugglets.Utility
tagline: A PowerShell module with nearly all of the vNugglets goodness from over the years, all in one place!
body:
## vNugglets.Utility PowerShell module ##

Some examples and their sample output (see each cmdlet's help for more examples):
### Do something
		PS C:\> Connect-VNVIServer -Credential (Get-Credential dom\user) -Server myVC.dom.com
		Windows PowerShell credential request
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
